titleNullable: Book Crossing Descriptions from Google API
descriptionNullable:
# Dataset Source
[Link](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ruchi798/bookcrossing-dataset)

# Description
Contains 278,858 users (anonymized but with demographic information) providing 1,149,780 ratings (explicit/implicit) about 271,379 books.

# Google API
- There is no information regarding book descriptions.
- We use Google API to collect descriptions of books according to their ISTPN.
- Create and save a new CSV file called Book_Descriptions which we used in Content-based Recommendation System with Cosine Similarity.
title: Book Crossing Descriptions from Google API
description:
# Dataset Source
[Link](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ruchi798/bookcrossing-dataset)

# Description
Contains 278,858 users (anonymized but with demographic information) providing 1,149,780 ratings (explicit/implicit) about 271,379 books.

# Google API
- There is no information regarding book descriptions.
- We use Google API to collect descriptions of books according to their ISTPN.
- Create and save a new CSV file called Book_Descriptions which we used in Content-based Recommendation System with Cosine Similarity.
